title: New: Metronomy – The Look
body:
**‘The Look’** is the second release from forthcoming third album **‘The English Riviera’** which is released on 11th April and is an instant **Metronomy** classic.

As what seems standard with the band now, the song is so effortless. A twinkling build up, a gorgeous melody, crestfallen lyrics and even a solo on a vintage organ.

Not just a wonderful song but a **brilliant video too**. Stop-frame animation, bemused pigeons and dodgems. Watch below:

Expect a review of the album shortly. In the meantime, **pre-order** it here: [http://www.metronomy.co.uk/shop/en/](http://www.metronomy.co.uk/shop/en/ "Metronomy Album Pre-Order")
